Package ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.views

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FView<M>
    Interface for all of the Views that Deal with the Fragment Model.
    Provides the method update(M) which is called whenever we the Fragment Model has been updated.
    LView<M>
    All interfaces that deal with the StoryList Model must implement me.
    OView<M>
    An interface that all OnlineViews implement in order to be properly updated when the online task has downloaded all of the story titles and authors to list.
    SView<M>
    A view that interacts the story model
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChoiceEditActivity
    Activity used for choice editing within the selected story.
    EditTextSegOnClickListener
    Listener for a fragment modification.
    FragmentEditActivity
    Activity for editing a fragment.
    FragmentListArrayAdapter
    An extension of ArrayAdapter that is used to display Fragments in a ListView
    FragmentPartAdapter
    An extension of ArrayAdapter that is used to display FragmentParts in a ListView when viewing a Fragment.
    FragmentViewActivity
    Activity for viewing a fragment.
    HelpNew  
    HelpOnline  
    HelpRead  
    HelpScreen  
    MainActivity
    Activity displayed for the start of the application.
    OnlineStorySearchActivity
    Activity that allows the user to search through the online story list to find a desired title or author.
    OnlineStoryViewActivity
    Activity used for viewing any stories that have been published online and are viewed through the listview.
    StoryAuthorMapListAdapter
    Adapter that communicates between the online list of stories and the listview that displays them
    StoryEditActivity
    View for editing a Story using a StoryController.
    This particular Activity should only be started via an intent from the main activity that has as an extra either the ID of the story to edit or NEW_STORY_ID
    StoryListArrayAdapter
    Adapter that communicates between the list of stories and the text corresponding to display the story in the list.
    StorySearchActivity
    Activity that allows the user to search through the story list of the offline cache to find a desired title or author.
